text.value: The woman is visibly pregnant but does not know for how long.
You performed a pregnancy test and it is positive but the woman does not know the age of the pregnancy or LMP.
The woman is not on any family planning methods and has missed her periods.
Has delivered four or more children
Last baby born less than one year ago
Registering a pregnancy will help you to provide timely guidance and support to the pregnant woman.
How would you like to report the pregnancy?
Start date cannot be less than 1 month ago. Start date cannot be more than 9 months in the future.
Please enter the start date of the LMP.
Would you like to report the pregnancy in weeks or months?
Date cannot be in the past. Date cannot be more than 9 months in the future.
Please enter the expected date of delivery.
The estimated date of delivery is: ****
If this seems incorrect, click "< Prev" and update the pregnancy information.
Why do you want to register ?
Refer to the health facility to confirm. You will receive tasks every two weeks to check in on the pregnancy. Schedule will follow WHO recommendations once LMP or EDD is entered.
Must be an integer between 0 and 9.
How many times has been to the health facility for ANC?
Enter 0 if she has not been yet.
You entered that has attended 1 ANC visit at the health facility.
You entered that has attended ANC visits at the health facility.
Please enter the date if you know it.
Enter the correct date. Date must be within this pregnancy and cannot be in the future.
Please enter the dates if you have them.
Each "Visit" section below asks about one individual visit. Please complete all sections.
Enter the correct date. Date must be within this pregnancy and cannot be in the future.
If has a specific upcoming ANC appointment date, enter it here. You will receive a task three days before to remind her to attend.
Date cannot be in the past. Date cannot be more than one month from today.
The WHO recommends ANC visits at 12, 20, 26, 30, 34, 36, 38, 40 weeks.
Please refer to the health facility at the appropriate time.
Has had any miscarriages or stillbirths?
If "None of the above" selected, cannot select any other option.
Does have any of these risk factors?
If "None of the above" selected, cannot select any other option.
Does have any of these risk factors?
Are there additional factors that could make this pregnancy high-risk?
Ask to monitor these danger signs throughout the pregnancy.
Does currently have any of these danger signs?
Great news! Please closely monitor her until her next scheduled pregnancy visit.
Please refer to the health facility immediately. Accompany her if possible.
Please complete the follow-up task within 3 days.
Does use a long-lasting insecticidal net (LLIN)?
Sleeping under a LLIN **EVERY night** prevents malaria.
Get malaria prophylaxis in second trimester if living in malaria endemic area.
Iron folate aids in the development of child's brain and spinal cord. It also prevents premature birth, sepsis, anemia and low birth weight.
Worms can affect the nutritional status of and baby.
Eat more often than usual and a balanced diet to give you strength and help the baby grow.
Talk softly to the unborn baby. The baby can hear you and will be able to recognize voices.
Respond to the baby's movements-kicks by gentle touching or massaging your tummy.
It's safest to deliver in a health facility. Discuss a birth plan with .
Has been tested for HIV in the past 3 months?
Frequent testing ensures that receives medicine to prevent transmission of HIV to the baby.
Has received any Tetanus Toxoid (TT) immunizations during this pregnancy?
Immunizing with at least two doses of tetanus toxoid before or during pregnancy protects the newborn for the first few weeks of life and protects the mother.
Women can receive up to two TT vaccines per pregnancy. After five TT vaccines, they are vaccinated for life.
Click the Submit button at the bottom of the form.
Has delivered four or more children
Last baby born less than one year ago
The WHO recommends routine ANC visits at 12, 20, 26, 30, 34, 36, 38, 40 weeks.
Please refer to the health facility at the appropriate time.
Please refer to the health facility immediately to receive the EDD and appropriate care.
Please conduct a danger sign follow-up in 3 days.
Make sure attends her clinic visit on . Please remind her three days before.
Please conduct the next pregnancy home visit in week(s).
Please conduct the next pregnancy home visit in 2 weeks.

bind.calculate: if(selected(../risk_factors_history/first_pregnancy, 'yes') or selected(../risk_factors_history/previous_miscarriage, 'yes') or not(selected(../risk_factors_present/primary_condition, 'none')) and ../risk_factors_present/primary_condition != '' or not(selected(../risk_factors_present/secondary_condition, 'none')) and ../risk_factors_present/secondary_condition != '' or selected(../risk_factors_present/additional_risk_check, 'yes') , 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../vaginal_bleeding, 'yes') or selected(../fits, 'yes') or selected(../severe_abdominal_pain, 'yes') or selected(../severe_headache, 'yes') or selected(../very_pale, 'yes') or selected(../fever, 'yes') or selected(../reduced_or_no_fetal_movements, 'yes') or selected(../breaking_water, 'yes') or selected(../easily_tired, 'yes') or selected(../face_hand_swelling, 'yes') or selected(../breathlessness, 'yes'), 'yes', if(selected(../vaginal_bleeding, 'no') and selected(../fits, 'no') and selected(../severe_abdominal_pain, 'no') and selected(../severe_headache, 'no') and selected(../very_pale, 'no') and selected(../fever, 'no') and selected(../reduced_or_no_fetal_movements, 'no') and selected(../breaking_water, 'no') and selected(../easily_tired, 'no') and selected(../face_hand_swelling, 'no') and selected(../breathlessness, 'no'), 'no', ''))

if((selected(../tetanus/tt_imm_received, 'no') or selected(../hiv_status/hiv_tested, 'no') or selected(../deworming/deworming_med, 'no') or selected(../iron_folate/iron_folate_daily, 'no')), 'yes', 'no')
